text: Adult "goals" set by society... just myths we chase till we realize life goes its own way – especially when your paycheck feels like pocket change sometimes 🤷‍♂️
Adulthood's supposed 'stability'? A laugh when your week includes carving statues one day then hunting commissions next... What even *is* normal these days? 🤷‍♂️
Art’s all about breaking molds—gender norms included...In sculpture work nobody bats an eye at your genre if your craftsmanship speaks volumes—admin offices could take some notes!
pshh...even sculptors get boxed in — arte knows no gender!
